FuncDef: This command configures static transit aa-subs with a name and an app-profile. A new transit sub with both a name and an app-profile is configured with the create command. Static transit aa-sub must have an explicitly assigned app-profile. An existing transit sub can optionally be assigned a different app-profile, or this command can be used to enter the static-aa-sub context.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of a transit subscriber up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies the name of an existing application profile up to 32 characters in length.
Keyword used to create a new app-profile entry.
